nodes.text: Graedler was a male Imperial Moff who lived during the Galactic Civil War. Sometime following the Battle of Yavin, his nephew Zim Graedler was kidnapped by a competitor, who lost to him in the Narmle Arts Gala. However, Jaleela Bindoo tasked a spacer with successfully rescuing the Moff's newphew.

Graedler was first mentioned in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
